trans-unit.source: Specifies the padding mode and parameters to use with RSA signature creation or verification operations.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o modo de preenchimento e os parâmetros a serem usados com operações de criação ou verificação de assinatura RSA.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding" /> objects for equality.
trans-unit.target: Compara dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding" /> quanto à igualdade.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current instance.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser comparado com a instância atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se essa instância é igual a um objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified object is equal to the current object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o objeto especificado for igual ao objeto atual, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The current instance and `obj` are equal if `obj` is a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding> instance and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A> property of the two objects is equal.
trans-unit.target: A instância atual e `obj` são iguais se `obj` é um <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding> instância e o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A> propriedade dos dois objetos é igual.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current instance.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser comparado com a instância atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se essa instância é igual a um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified object is equal to the current object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o objeto especificado for igual ao objeto atual, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The current instance and `other` are equal if the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A> property of the two objects is equal.
trans-unit.target: A instância atual e `other` são iguais se os <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A> propriedade dos dois objetos é igual.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para essa instância <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding" />.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: O código hash para essa instância <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the padding mode of this <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o modo de preenchimento desta instância <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding" />.

trans-unit.source: The padding mode (either <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePaddingMode.Pkcs1" /> or <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePaddingMode.Pss" />) of this instance.
trans-unit.target: O modo de preenchimento (tanto <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePaddingMode.Pkcs1" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePaddingMode.Pss" />) desta instância.

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro objeto a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo objeto a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding" /> objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: Indica se dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding" /> especificados são iguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see langword="left" /> and <see langword="right" /> are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see langword="left" /> e <see langword="right" /> forem iguais; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.op_Equality%2A> method defines the operation of the equality operator for <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding> values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.op_Equality%2A> método define a operação do operador de igualdade para <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding> valores.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding> values are equal if their <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A> property values are equal.
trans-unit.target: Dois <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding> valores são iguais se seus <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A> valores de propriedade são iguais.

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro objeto a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo objeto a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding" /> objects are unequal.
trans-unit.target: Indica se dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding" /> especificados são desiguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see langword="left" /> and <see langword="right" /> are unequal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see langword="left" /> e <see langword="right" /> forem diferentes; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.op_Inequality%2A> method defines the operation of the inequality operator for <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding> values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.op_Inequality%2A> método define a operação do operador de desigualdade para <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding> valores.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding> values are unequal if their <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A> property values are different.
trans-unit.target: Dois <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding> valores são diferentes se seus <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A> valores de propriedade são diferentes.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that uses the PKCS #1 v1.5 padding mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que usa o modo de preenchimento PKCS nº 1 v1.5.

trans-unit.source: An object that uses the <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePaddingMode.Pkcs1" /> padding mode.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que usa o modo de preenchimento <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePaddingMode.Pkcs1" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that uses PSS padding mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que usa o modo de preenchimento PSS.

trans-unit.source: An object that uses the <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePaddingMode.Pss" /> padding mode with the number of salt bytes equal to the size of the hash.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que usa o modo de preenchimento <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePaddingMode.Pss" /> com o número de bytes de sal igual ao tamanho do hash.

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a representação de cadeia de caracteres da instância <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the current object.
trans-unit.target: A representação de cadeia de caracteres do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.ToString%2A> method returns the value of the `RSASignaturePadding.Mode.ToString` method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.ToString%2A> método retornará o valor de `RSASignaturePadding.Mode.ToString` método.
